actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation for the modification of the Riverton Reclamation Project in Wyoming, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation for the modification of the Riverton Unit, Pick-Sloane Missouri River Basin, including the study of alternate industrial water supplies in the Wind River Basin, Wyoming.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation for the modification of the Riverton Reclamation Project in Wyoming, and for other purposes.
